ragLegend.green: official-sdk (or official package + sdk-first as far as public APIs allow)

entries.nextAction: Maintain current route; monitor @morpho-org/blue-sdk public API changes for execute support parity.
Maintain current route; keep strategy normalizer aligned with Morpho SDK release notes.
Maintain scaffold-compat warning behavior until official rewards claim SDK flow is published.

blockers: SDK-first execute now consumes @morpho-org/blue-sdk for vault conversion math/projection + metadata, but @morpho-org/blue-sdk still does not expose a public tx signer/executor pipeline for vault deposit; ethers signer remains canonical execute client with explicit remainingNonSdkPath/fallback markers
entries.nextAction: Track Morpho Blue SDK for public execute signer pipeline; switch tx submit path from canonical ethers signer once available.

blockers: Official @venusprotocol/sdk package is not published on npm; using @venusprotocol/chains + provider ABI reads
entries.nextAction: Replace scaffold/provider read path with official @venusprotocol/sdk once publicly published and stable.
Adopt official Venus SDK account-position APIs once package is published; remove scaffold mode warning path.

blockers: SDK-first market/vToken resolution uses official @venusprotocol/chains, but transaction submission still relies on canonical ethers signer because no public official Venus execute SDK is published
entries.nextAction: Migrate execute path when official Venus tx executor SDK becomes available; then retire explicit non-sdk execute marker.

blockers: No maintained official Lista npm SDK currently available
entries.nextAction: Re-check official Lista SDK candidates (@lista-dao/*) each release cycle; replace canonical ethers reads once maintained package appears.

blockers: No maintained official Lista npm SDK currently available
entries.nextAction: Adopt official Lista position/account SDK APIs when available and remove canonical-only status.

blockers: SDK-first adapter now drives canonical ethers signer/provider execution with explicit remainingNonSdkPath + fallback markers, but no maintained official Lista execute SDK is published
entries.nextAction: Switch execute adapter to official Lista tx SDK once maintained package is published.

blockers: @wombat-exchange/configx provides configuration metadata only; market reads still use provider calls
entries.nextAction: Adopt full official Wombat read SDK when published; keep configx metadata integration as optional complement.

blockers: No full official npm SDK for read/execute parity
entries.nextAction: Migrate wallet/position reads once official Wombat SDK exposes stable position APIs.
